title: Goblin Slayer Gaiden 2: Tsubanari no Daikatana
original_name: ゴブリンスレイヤー外伝 2 鍔鳴の太刀《ダイ・カタナ》
sinopse: Tells the story of Sword Maiden from years ago, when she was an adventurer herself, in a party composed of a mysterious Samurai, his older sister who is a magic wielder, a scout Rhea and more to discover.
